headline: Changing the way people buy by giving superpowers to shoppers
description:
We receive any product in 24h anywhere on the planet, but... Why can't we also return & get refunded just as quickly?

REVER is a game-changing shopping experience that makes eCommerce returns possible in 2 clicks and refunds in 24h.

The REVER team is shaping the future of eCommerce bringing frictionless, superfast and sustainable returns to everyone, anytime, anywhere. Because returning should be as easy as buying. 

REVER's ambition is to dominate ALL eCommerce post-sale services by creating the world's first global platform for online returns.

REVER is currently handling +100M‚Ç¨ in yearly returns, with more than 50M‚Ç¨ in revenues

If you are an eCommerce and want to revolutionise your returns experience find out more at: www.itsrever.com

[ What is REVER and how can it benefit my eCommerce?](https://itsrever.com/<#>)
REVER is a returns management solution designed to streamline the returns process for eCommerce. It delivers fast, frictionless and sustainable returns, helping to improve customer satisfaction, reduce operational costs and increase overall efficiency.
[How does REVER improve the customer experience?](https://itsrever.com/<#>)
By offering a simple and convenient returns process, REVER ensures that your customers have a positive experience when returning products, resulting in increased loyalty and repeat purchases.
[How does REVER integrate with my existing e-commerce platform?](https://itsrever.com/<#>)
REVER integrates seamlessly with popular eCommerce platforms such as Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento and PrestaShop. Our team will work closely with you to ensure a smooth integration process and provide the necessary guidance and support.
[Can REVER handle international returns?](https://itsrever.com/<#>)
Yes, REVER supports international returns. Our platform is designed to handle returns from customers around the world, providing a consistent and efficient returns experience for your global customer base.
[How does REVER help to reduce customer service issues related to returns?](https://itsrever.com/<#>)
REVER automates many aspects of the returns process, including tracking, processing and managing customer queries. By offering self-service options and real-time updates, customers can easily track the status of their returns, reducing the need for support tickets.
